itemDescription: writer and lecturer at Dundee Training College

wikipedia_page.main: William Bayne (1858–1922) was a writer and a lecturer at Dundee Training College. He was born on 13 April 1858 at Lawhead, Cameron in Fife. His father was Thomas Bayne, a shoemaker, and his mother Ann Robertson. He died unmarried at Radernie, Cameron  on 17 November 1922, aged 64.

response: *Thomson, James. Poems, edited by William Bayne, London : Walter Scott Publishing Co., [1900], (Series: The Canterbury poets).
